info.title: Laravel Modular E-commerce API
info.description: This is the API documentation for the Laravel Modular E-commerce API.

post.description: Create a category with English and Arabic names and an image.

get.description: Retrieve a single category by its unique ID.
Retrieve a list of all products with their images and categories

post.description: Create a new product with multilingual content, images, and category associations. All fields are required for product creation.

requestBody.description: Product creation data including multilingual content, images, and categories

description[en].example: High-performance gaming laptop with advanced graphics and fast processor

description[ar].example: حاسوب محمول عالي الأداء للألعاب مع رسومات متقدمة ومعالج سريع

price.description: Product price (required, must be 0 or greater)

images[].description: Product images (required, at least one image)

items.description: Image file (jpeg, png, jpg, gif, svg)

categories[].description: Category IDs (required, at least one category)

en.example: High-performance gaming laptop with advanced graphics and fast processor

ar.example: حاسوب محمول عالي الأداء للألعاب مع رسومات متقدمة ومعالج سريع

items.example: The price must be a number.

message.example: Failed to create product due to server error

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific product by ID

post.description: Update an existing product with new multilingual content, images, and categories. All fields are required for update.

requestBody.description: Updated product data including multilingual content, optional images, and categories

name[en].description: Updated product name in English (required, 3-100 characters)

name[ar].description: Updated product name in Arabic (required, 3-100 characters)

description[en].description: Updated product description in English (required, 3-1000 characters)
description[en].example: Enhanced high-performance gaming laptop with latest graphics and ultra-fast processor

description[ar].description: Updated product description in Arabic (required, 3-1000 characters)
description[ar].example: حاسوب محمول محسن عالي الأداء للألعاب مع أحدث الرسومات ومعالج فائق السرعة

price.description: Updated product price (required, must be 0 or greater)

images[].description: New product images (optional, replaces all existing images if provided)

items.description: Image file (jpeg, png, jpg, gif, svg)

categories[].description: Updated category IDs (optional, replaces all existing categories if provided)

en.example: Enhanced high-performance gaming laptop with latest graphics and ultra-fast processor

ar.example: حاسوب محمول محسن عالي الأداء للألعاب مع أحدث الرسومات ومعالج فائق السرعة

items.example: The price must be a number.

message.example: Failed to update product due to server error

delete.description: Permanently delete an existing product and all its associated data including images, categories associations, and related records. This action cannot be undone.

message.example: Failed to delete product due to server error
